articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT shann.eth 🏡
Thrilled to be working with the Frothy team @blaiseturnbull @mahoney_magic on place- based approaches to @livepeer community growth and engagement. And to have @petkanics guiding our project through another crypto winter. For anyone looking to stay warm - Livepeer’s door is open!
Frothy DAO 🫧,🫧: we had fun sharing Frothy strategy juice🧃with the Livepeer ecosystem in this quarterly community update! 
check out the livestream recording if you're keen to hear from @petkanics @shanvasion + Frothy team @mahoney_magic @blaiseturnbull 🫧🫧
 https://twitter.com/Livepeer/status/1524743500595490816

articles.description:
RT camiinthisthang.eth
The crypto/web3 crowd (me included) needs to find ways to loop in people who’ve been “working to build a better world” for ages. Like teachers. 
We’re missing so much amazing insight and innovation by siloing efforts off to people with a technical/financial background
